title: TEEMO SHROOMS BLOW UP IF WARD DIES ON TOP OF IT
body: Teemo's shrooms blow up if any type of ward is destroyed on top of it, and it does not deal damage. Still. I told you before riot. Stop nerfing my champion.

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of a few issues with ward debris and are working to resolve them. ^-^

Can confirm this, just tested it, Easy to reproduce too, Just place a mushroom, then have someone on enemy team place a ward on it (any type of ward) and kill it, when it dies and the debris spawns the mushroom triggers and disappears.
This happened to me too. I thought it was a intentional thing at first.  I think trigger teemos shrooms with a ward would be a neat idea though.
yes, I know. But that still doesn't mean he should be bugged.

Teemo shrooms are super bugged right now because they do **not** apply any additional spell effects, like {{item:3151}} {{item:3285}} or Deathfire Touch. I'm level 5 mastery with Teemo, he's one of my favorite champions. I can't wait for him to get fixed. 

But that ward bug is a bug with the ward debris, not the shrooms. Ward debris becomes target-able for a split second when it first appears. Anything can hit it, including Thresh. Lol he can actually use his hook to pull himself to a dying ward if he times it right.
